directions: Put egg whites, sugar, water and syrup in top of double boiler.  Beat until mixed well.  Place over rapidly boiling water.  Beat constantly with electric beater while it cooks for 7 minutes or until it will stand in peaks when beater is raised.  Remove from heat.  Add vanilla.  Beat.  Fills and frosts 2 layer cake, 8 or 9 inch.
title: Seven Minute Frosting I
